action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
DESCRIPTION: The grid is 5x5. The first column is filled with X's. The remaining columns are filled with squares (▢).

▢ X X X ▢
▢ X X X ▢

DESCRIPTION: The grid is 5x5. It has a cross shape made of Xs in the center, with the vertical line extending to the bottom edge. The cross is symmetric. The top two rows have single Xs in the third column. The third and fourth rows have three consecutive Xs in the middle. The last row is filled entirely with Xs.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The grid is 5x5. The first column is filled with X's. The remaining columns are filled with squares (▢).

QUESTION: Does your grid have any Xs in the last row?
